short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to open the current webpage on your phone by scanning the QRCode generated for that webpage's URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple extension that will save your time by helping you to open the current webpage on your mobile phone browser. It converts the current webpage's URL to QRCode which can be scanned by your phone. You can then very easily and simply open that webpage on your mobile phone browser.
